languages.text: {n}Блестящие глаза девушки гаснут, разом теряя надежду. Эдитка вытирает нос рукавом и горько вздыхает.{/n} "Простите, Ваше Светлишество. Вы все верно сделали. Мне не стоило портить вам игру".

{n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."
languages.original_text: {n}Блестящие глаза девушки гаснут, разом теряя надежду. Эдитка вытирает нос рукавом и горько вздыхает.{/n} "Простите, Ваше Светлишество. Вы все верно сделали. Мне не стоило портить вам игру".

traits.locale_text: {n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

{n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

{n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

{n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

{n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

languages.text: {n}女人闪闪发光的眼睛变得黯淡下来，所有希望的光芒都熄灭了。她用袖子擦了擦鼻子，沮丧地叹了口气。{/n}“请原谅我，大人。您只是做了您该做的事情，是我不该坏了您的兴致。”
languages.original_text: {n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

traits.locale_text: {n}女人闪闪发光的眼睛变得黯淡下来，所有希望的光芒都熄灭了。她用袖子擦了擦鼻子，沮丧地叹了口气。{/n}“请原谅我，大人。您只是做了您该做的事情，是我不该坏了您的兴致。”

languages.text: {n}女性の潤んだ瞳から、すべての希望が消え失せた。彼女は袖で鼻をぬぐい、失望したようにため息をついた。{/n}「許して、ありがたき方。あんたはすべきことをしただけ。私があんたの遊びを台無しにしたのがいけなかったんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

traits.locale_text: {n}女性の潤んだ瞳から、すべての希望が消え失せた。彼女は袖で鼻をぬぐい、失望したようにため息をついた。{/n}「許して、ありがたき方。あんたはすべきことをしただけ。私があんたの遊びを台無しにしたのがいけなかったんだ」

languages.text: {n}La esperanza se desvanece de los ojos llorosos de la mujer. Se limpia la nariz con la manga y deja escapar un suspiro de congoja.{/n} «Discúlpeme, Excelencia. Ha hecho lo que debía. No tengo ningún derecho a estropearle el juego».
languages.original_text: {n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

traits.locale_text: {n}La esperanza se desvanece de los ojos llorosos de la mujer. Se limpia la nariz con la manga y deja escapar un suspiro de congoja.{/n} «Discúlpeme, Excelencia. Ha hecho lo que debía. No tengo ningún derecho a estropearle el juego».

languages.text: {n}Kadının parıldayan gözlerindeki umut ışığı sönüyor. Burnunu koluyla silip kederle iç çekiyor.{/n} "Kusuruma bakmayın {mf|beyim|hanımım}. Siz üzerinize düşeni yaptınız. İşinize karışmamalıydım."
languages.original_text: {n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadının parıldayan gözlerindeki umut ışığı sönüyor. Burnunu koluyla silip kederle iç çekiyor.{/n} "Kusuruma bakmayın {mf|beyim|hanımım}. Siz üzerinize düşeni yaptınız. İşinize karışmamalıydım."

languages.text: {n}Tout espoir s'évanouit dans ses yeux embués de larmes. Elle s'essuie le nez du revers de la manche et laisse échapper un soupir accablé.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Gracieuseté. Vous êtes dans votre bon droit. Il ne m'appartient pas de gâcher votre bon plaisir. »
languages.original_text: {n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout espoir s'évanouit dans ses yeux embués de larmes. Elle s'essuie le nez du revers de la manche et laisse échapper un soupir accablé.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Gracieuseté. Vous êtes dans votre bon droit. Il ne m'appartient pas de gâcher votre bon plaisir. »

languages.text: {n}Alle Hoffnung schwindet aus den feuchten Augen der Frau. Sie putzt sich mit ihrem Ärmel die Nase und seufzt niedergeschlagen.{/n} "Verzeiht mir, Euer Gnaden. Ihr habt Euch angemessen verhalten. Ich hätte Euer Spiel nicht stören dürfen."
languages.original_text: {n}All hope fades from the woman's glistening eyes. She wipes her nose with her sleeve and lets out a dejected sigh.{/n} "Pardon me, Your Graciousness. You've done as you should. It wasn't right of me to spoil your game."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alle Hoffnung schwindet aus den feuchten Augen der Frau. Sie putzt sich mit ihrem Ärmel die Nase und seufzt niedergeschlagen.{/n} "Verzeiht mir, Euer Gnaden. Ihr habt Euch angemessen verhalten. Ich hätte Euer Spiel nicht stören dürfen."
